reviewText:
This is a movie featuring several stories of young teens (over 18) exploring their sexuality. Lots of nudity, graphic sex acts edited to barely miss penetration and explosive shots, plenty of self stimulation, and helping hands, internet sex chat, nude photography session, even a girl who is willing to help her gay friend seduce a straight guy from an on line personal ad! This film also shows what all boys do when they are alone, or bored, (or not bored...)
It pushes the boundaries of what a straight dude is willing to do with a new buddy.
While there are no personal explosive moments shown in the film, it is erotic and fun enough where you won't need them to have one of your own... Just because the graphic sex is on the next (missing) frame, doesn't mean you won't fully enjoy this dvd! XXX gay porn action, edited to barely get an X, but would probably earn an NC-17.
If you don't make it all the way through the first time, start where you left off, the plumber in the shower scene is awesome!
I would definitely buy this DVD again after owning it!

`Straight Boys Gay Boys' is a soft core, slick porn. It's your usual soft core with some hot guys showing off their naked bodies to start off your night. What makes this movie different from others is its portrayal. Some of the motion sequencing can be almost dream like in the sense of flow. These videos will definitely set the beginning of one sexy time. The other point is the endless tease, as if hearing a long violin note that is just aching and waiting to resolve itself.

If you're from Chicago, you'll really appreciate some scenarios and locations. As for the models, they display a realistic hotness, as some guys you would actually run into at the local club.  The acting and dialogue is alright, but I feel as if it could have been taken a little bit further to seal the deal. All and all I really enjoyed the straight/gay Ying Yang and the way it made you believe the two groups were meant for each other.

One problem I see in most soft core porns is the chapters maybe showcase some of the same models, but rarely link their scenes together. But low budget productions can offer only so much, right?!

Overall, I actually give this a 4/5. Light touch up, but you're getting what you paid: hot guys, sweaty teasing scenes, and some ultra fantasies to get you through your daily week.

I bought this DVD about a month ago when I came back from a stressful business trip and I must say it did manage to relax me, put a smile on my face and turn me on.

There are certain moments that were my very favorite (e.g. When the Plumber closes the shower glass door with a gesture "no you can't" is one for example, or when the young redhead manipulates his victim into posing in that humiliating way)

All and all I found the approach fresh and non typical in compare to other gay movies that are populating the market now a days.

The thinking of this concept come from an obviously different space, more like a straight movie does, and maybe that is what I liked.

This film is so amateur.  The acting is atrocious.  The situations totally not credible.  The dialogue is silly.  I bought this dvd on the basis of the reviews on amazon.  I can only believe the reviews were posted by the filmmakers as these are truly bad movies.  Don't buy!
